reference: De Bondt, W. F. M. and Richard H. Thaler, 1985, Does the stock market overreact? Journal of Finance 40, 793-805.

Cohen, Randolph B., Paul A. Gompers, and Tuomo Vuolteenaho, 2002,Who underreacts to cash-flow news? Evidence from trading between individuals and institutions, Journal of Financial Economics, forthcoming.
Benartzi, Shlomo and Richard H. Thaler, 1995, Myopic loss aversion and the equity premium puzzle, Quarterly Journal of Economics 110, 73-92.
Baker, Malcolm and Jeremy Stein, 2002, Market liquidity as a sentiment indicator, working paper, Harvard University.
Bagwell, Laurie S., 1992, Dutch auction repurchases: An analysis of shareholder heterogeneity, Journal of Finance 47, 71-105.
Baker, Malcolm and Serkan Savasoglu, 2002, Limited arbitrage in mergers and acquisitions, Journal of Financial Economics 64, 91-116.
